title: Jameela Jamil wows in low-cut feathered dress as she attends InStyle Awards with beau James Blake
text:
She's not scared in calling others out on social media and fighting for what she believes in.

And Jameela Jamil looked happy and relaxed as she enjoyed a night out at the fifth annual InStyle Awards held at The Getty Center in Los Angeles on Monday night alongside her beau James Blake.

The British actress, 33, looked incredible as she showed off her assets in an incredibly plunging feathered Prabal Gurung dress.

Date night: Jameela Jamil, 33, enjoyed a night out at the fifth annual InStyle Awards held at The Getty Center in Los Angeles on Monday night alongside her beau James Blake, 31

Jameela certainly commanded attention in the monochrome number which boasted a corsetted top half.

The rest of the feathered dress fell at an ankle-grazing length and she boosted her already statuesque height in a pair of towering white heels.

The half Indian, half Pakistani beauty enhanced her striking features with a glossy coat of red lipstick which complemented her long, glossy fringed mane.

Wow: The British actress looked incredible as she showed off her assets in an incredibly plunging feathered Prabal Gurung dress

Looking good: Jameela certainly commanded attention in the monochrome number which boasted a corsetted top half

Standing tall: The rest of the feathered dress fell at an ankle-grazing length and she boosted her already statuesque height in a pair of towering white heels

Jameela's musician beau of four years James cut a dapper figure in a slick navy suit which he teamed with a simple black top.

Meanwhile, Jameela is currently locked in a bitter Twitter feud with her long-time nemesis Piers Morgan.

It all began when Piers tweeted that he was against 'rich privileged famous whining all the time about how awful their lives are.'

Pretty: The half Indian, half Pakistani beauty enhanced her striking features with a glossy coat of red lipstick which complemented her long, glossy fringed mane

Social media savvy: Jameela was seen modelling her sensational red carpet look on her Instagram Stories

Trio: Jameela looked in high spirits as she posed alongside Connie Britton (L) and Hunter Schafer (R)

Final touches: Jameela completed her look with a pair of sparkling, dangling earrings

When author Matt Haig noted a list of stars who had sadly committed suicide as a result of their mental health battles, Jameela was quick to add:

'The thing is matt, someone broke @piersmorgan a long time ago, and so he despises chat of mental health, because it would incur a potential investigation for him, into the dark past that made him an addict for being a panto villain. He lives for the vitriol, ridicule and abuse.'

Piers responded: 'I only have a problem with people like you two preaching compassion & tolerance whilst abusing anyone who dares to challenge you.'

'You openly abuse people': Jameela is currently locked in a bitter Twitter feud with her long-time nemesis Piers Morgan

Jameela then fired back: 'You don’t “disagree” with us. You openly abuse people and put harmful rhetoric out into the world with your large platform, when I know from your friends you don’t even believe half the nonsense you spew. So we interrupt your flow of defiant ignorance towards marginalized groups.'

She was also recently embroiled in a feud with Caroline Flack over her controversial new plastic surgery show, The Surjury.

Jameela posted a story and wrote: 'Welp. Black Mirror is officially happening guys. It’s here.'
description: Jameela Jamil, 33, enjoyed a night out at the fifth annual InStyle Awards held at The Getty Center in Los Angeles on Monday night alongside her beau James Blake, 31.
